title: Metaschema URI must include trailing `#` (Draft 4-7)
description: For Draft 4, 6, and 7, the canonical metaschema URLs end with `schema#`. Omitting the fragment identifier can confuse tooling and may bypass caching.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Missing # in draft-07 metaschema URI
comprehensiveExamples.description: Older drafts require the trailing # in the metaschema URI.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Correct draft-07 URI with #
comprehensiveExamples.description: Using the canonical URI avoids tooling ambiguity.

message: Append a trailing `#` to the metaschema URI (e.g. â€¦`schema#`).
